name: Unfathomable
description:
Unfathomable

Made in 48 hours for the Ludum Dare 48 Compo Game Jam, with the theme "Deeper and deeper".

Fall onto an alien planet and explore deep undersea caves. Take on ballast to descend further, but beware of the hostile flora and fauna.

Controls

Keyboard and all common joysticks and game controllers are supported.

KeyActionWSAD / Arrow keys / Controller stickMoveR / Top controller button(HOLD) Reset to last checkpoint
